item.title: About me and this blog.
item.description: Welcome to my webblog.My Name is Theo Braune and here I will publish blogposts related to technology and Science. Currently I am in doing a Master at the Institut Polytechnique in Computer Science and a Master of Mathematics at the TU Berlin. I am interested in differential geometry, geometry processing and the simulation of physical systems. My cv can be found here
